description:
Enhance search with real-time suggestions, fuzzy matching for typos, search history, and filters that adapt based on the current context. Show result counts for each filter before applying.

**Rationale:** Users get frustrated when search returns no results due to spelling errors or exact-match requirements. Intelligent search reduces friction, helps users discover content faster, and prevents dead-end experiences.
title: Smart Search with Auto-Suggestions and Typo Tolerance
